rooms.description: Open-plan living area with Bohemian decor and ample natural light; includes a seating area and entertainment zone.
Modern kitchen with open design; features ergonomic counters for wheelchair accessibility and Bohemian accents.
Primary bedroom with en-suite bathroom; designed with Bohemian aesthetics and accessible layout.
Accessible bathroom integrated within the bedroom, wheelchair friendly design, includes grab bars and non-slip tiles.
Dedicated fitness area with ample space for exercise equipment; designed with a relaxed Bohemian ambiance and accessible layout.

openings.description: Wheelchair accessible main entrance with wide door; includes ramp if needed.
Large windows to allow natural light and cross ventilation in line with Vastu principles.

levels.general_description: A Bohemian single-story 1BHK bungalow designed for a joint family. The plan is wheelchair accessible with smooth transitions between spaces. Rooms are arranged with consideration of Vastu principles, ensuring positive energy flow across the residence. The private gym is integrated into the design to promote health and wellness.
